[Link to dataset](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/rfordatascience/tidytuesday/master/data/2023/2023-02-14/age_gaps.csv)

Things you plan to investigate using this dataset:

- What is the average age gap between love interests in movies for specific actors?
- Does the release year of the movie change the age gap between the main love interests?
- Which of the age gaps for the movies made the most money in 2006.
- Do movies released in June and July on average make more than movies released in December and January in 2006 ?

Stat 251 topics you plan to cover during the analysis:

1. Data cleaning
2. Visualizing your data efficiently 
3. Joining data 
4. Dates and Times
